CustomField.formula: IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Installation_New_Appointment_Home_Aut__c = TRUE, "Home Automation"+BR(), "")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Installation_New_Appointment_Pest_Con__c = TRUE, "Pest Control"+BR(), "")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Installation_New_Appointment_Solar__c = TRUE,"Solar"+BR(), "")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Sale_New_Appointment_Water__c = TRUE,"Water"+BR(), "")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Installation_New_Appointment_Window__c =TRUE,"Window"+BR(),"")
CustomField.label: Automatic Text - New Appointment
